title: 306 - Where Are You?
description:
It's time to change the narrative related to fathers being in the lives of their children. In this episode, ET gets extremely passionate about the need for parents and particularly fathers to be present and involved in the lives of their children. This is definitely one you want to share with everyone in your community. Let's do what we can, starting today to help our kids have a better chance at the life thing!!!
Listener Perks 
ORGANIFI is giving our listeners up to 20% off of their order! Just go to www.organifi.com/success. Their superfood green juice powder allows you to get your greens anytime, anywhere while on the go.
Get connected with a network of thousands of people who listen to ET, and embody the work ethic and spirit of ET. To learn more about Breathe University. Subscribe to the podcast via Apple Podcasts.
